name: imbo/imbo
description: RESTful image server that handles image storage/transformations and metadata

suggest.ext-mongo: Enables usage of MongoDB and GridFS as database and store. Recommended version: >=1.4.0
suggest.ext-mongodb: Enables usage of the new MongoDB extension. Recommended version: >=1.1.3
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: Enables usage of the new MongoDB extension using the PHP MongoDB driver library. Recommended version: >=1.0.0
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Enables usage of using RDMS for storing data (and optionally images). Recommended version: >=2.3
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Enables usage of the AWS S3 storage adapter. Recommended version >=2.4
suggest.imbo/imbo-metadata-cache: Enabled caching of metadata through an event listener. Recommended version >=1.0.0
